message.body: What what do you need besides milk?
You don't have to buy any thing. I was just asking if you were gonna have it. Cause if you don't I'll get it
Its fine I need to grab a few food items anyway so ill be at the store. Besides youre doing us the favor watching the dog so ill get it.
But do you need bread or any specific cereal?
Do you have cereal? As long as you have a box.of something I'll be fine
Do you have detergent?
Yes detergent... I think we have frosted flakes and fruit loops
And rice krispies
And we need to get creamer too.. we have coffee
Okay than ks. That's fine
So are we gonna start hheading to Sam's
Wrong person?
Yeah sorry
Lol ok.. btw use new milk not the old one
Okay thanks. I'm going over now
My friends are coming.

That's fine. .. just a few things. .. toilet - pee press low flush, left button with a few dots. Poop - power flush, right button, lots of dots.... shower - kick water down drain afterwards so water doesn't sit all day.
Dishwasher - mugs, glasses, plastic bowls top rack. Ceramic and utensils bottom rack
Okay thanks
And I discovered that pee-poop flush distinction. Don't let Steph make you think she did.
Yea I wasn't sure if you already knew that... btw I think ice cream in the freezer, finish that off lol
Okay haha
